mapper.select: select cd.id, cd.name, cd.type from user yh left join user_role yhjs on yh.id = yhjs.user_id left join role_menu jscd on yhjs.role_id = jscd.role_id left join menu cd on jscd.menu_id = cd.id where yhjs.user_id = #{userId}
select cd.id, cd.name, cd.type, cd.url, cd.icon, yhcd.pxh, cd.parent_id from menu cd left join user_menu yhcd on cd.id = yhcd.menu_id where parent_id = #{parentId} order by yhcd.pxh

select cd.id, cd.name, cd.type, cd.url, cd.parent_id from menu cd left join user_menu yhcd on cd.id = yhcd.menu_id where parent_id in ( select menu_id from role_menu where role_id = #{roleId} ) order by IFNULL(yhcd.pxh, 10000)

select cd.id, cd.name, cd.type, cd.icon, cd.url, yhcd.pxh, cd.parent_id from user yh left join user_menu yhcd on yh.id = yhcd.user_id left join menu cd on yhcd.menu_id = cd.id where yh.id = #{userId} and yhcd.display = 1 order by IFNULL(yhcd.pxh, 10000)
